snippet: The Arab League called again on Sunday for Syrian security forces and armed groups to immediately halt the deadly violence in the country.
abstract: Arab League calls again for Syrian security forces and armed groups to immediately halt violence in the country; call comes on day when activists say at least 21 people were killed despite the presence of Arab League monitors.

byline.original: By MAYY EL SHEIKH and NADA BAKRI
byline.contributor: Mayy El Sheikh reported from Cairo, and Nada Bakri from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: The Arab League called again on Sunday for Syrian security forces and armed groups to immediately halt the deadly violence in the country.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
